description: T(n,k) = Number of n X k {-1,1}-arrays such that the sum over i=1..n,j=1..k of i*x(i,j) is zero, the sum of x(i,j) is zero, and rows are nondecreasing (number of ways to distribute k-across galley oarsmen left-right at n fore-aft positions so that there are no turning moments on the ship).
